info.title: WeatherBug
info.description: Develop weather applications or integrate localized, global weather conditions, forecasts and alerts into your apps.  Including Spark with near Real-Time location based Lightning Alerts.

parameters.name: SearchString
parameters.description: Parameter used to search for locations. Only U.S. zipcodes and citynames can be searched. SearchString is not case-sensitive and accepts blank spaces.

get.description: Returns the location based on U.S. and international city name. The soundex system allows searching for a city based on phonetics rather than spelling.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Location of a place north or south of the equator. Minimum value: -90. Maximum value: 90.

parameters.name: long
parameters.description: Location of a place east or west of the prime meridian. Minimum value -180. Maximum value: 180.

get.description: For a given latitude/longitude, returns the weather stations in the area.

parameters.name: UnitType
parameters.description: UnitType= 0 — U.S. customary units (miles, °F, etc...) [default]. UnitType= 1 — Metric system units (kms, °C, etc...).

parameters.name: OutputType
parameters.description: OutputType= 0 — Returns the RSS with the XML embedded inside it starting with "<aws:weather>" [default]. OutputType= 1 — Returns pure xml beginning with "<aws:weather>".

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Location of a place north or south of the equator. Minimum value: -90. Maximum value: 90.

parameters.name: long
parameters.description: Location of a place east or west of the prime meridian. Minimum value -180. Maximum value: 180.

get.description: Returns detailed live weather conditions for the chosen location.

parameters.description: UnitType= 0 — U.S. customary units (miles, °F, etc...) [default]. UnitType= 1 — Metric system units (kms, °C, etc...).

parameters.name: long

get.description: Returns the 7-day forecast for a latitude/longitude.

get.description: For a given latitude/longitude, this call returns a list of available weather cameras (U.S. Only).
